cta.description: Join 1,200+ patients who trust our AI for instant guidance and personalized care.

whatToAsk.description: From simple questions to complex concerns, our AI delivers expert-level guidance trained on thousands of real dental cases

examples.question: My tooth hurts when I bite down
examples.desc: Get immediate advice on pain management, possible causes, and when to see a dentist urgently

examples.question: How much does teeth whitening cost?
examples.desc: Compare treatment options, pricing ranges, and find the best whitening solution for your budget

examples.question: When should I replace my filling?
examples.desc: Learn about filling lifespan, warning signs of wear, and replacement timing guidance

footerDict.slogan: AI-powered dental assistance that actually helps.
footerDict.copyright: Built for real people with real dental questions.

howItWorks.description: Our streamlined process makes dental care accessible, convenient, and stress-free for everyone

steps.title: Ask Questions
steps.desc: Chat with our AI assistant about any dental concerns. Get instant answers about symptoms, treatments, and oral health tips.

steps.title: Get Expert Advice
steps.desc: Receive personalized recommendations based on thousands of dental cases. Our AI provides professional-grade insights.

steps.title: Book & Get Care
steps.desc: Schedule with verified dentists and receive comprehensive follow-up care. Track your progress seamlessly.

page.title: Book an Appointment

steps: Click the microphone button to start talking
Ask questions about dental health and treatments
